project.description:
This suite will execute ALL of the individual test groups.

MANUAL INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Click 'Build Now' to manually begin a test run.
  • From the list of fields, read their descriptions and set the values appropriate for your testing.
  • Then click the 'Build' button.
  • Then to view the executing tests in live action, click the 'localslave' link in the upper right corner on the building page for further VNC instructions.
WARNING: Do not use the TestNG Reports links on this page since their embedded screenshot links will not work. Instead click to the build# of interest to you in the Build History table below and open its TestNG Report.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: VERSION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Version of JON server you're testing against

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: SUITE_FILE
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Suite file to run. Note the suite file needs to be designed to run against the version of JON you selected.

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: password for admin of Jon or imanage

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SERVER_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The user that jon is installed and running under. Sometimes "root", or "jonqa", or another user jon.server.user=jonqa

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AGENT_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The user that rhq-agent is running under. Sometimes "root", or "jonqa", or another user jon.agent.user=root

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch of automation code to run with.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "===============" echo ${TEST_GROUP} echo "===============" rm -Rf * git clone git://github.com/weissjeffm/webui-framework.git git clone git://git.rhndev.redhat.com/automatjon chmod 600 $WORKSPACE/automatjon/jon/.ssh/id*
